original_text: “‘The priest is to write these curses on a scroll and then wash them off into the bitter water.
korean_text: 제사장이 저주의 말을 두루마리에 써서 그 글자를 그 쓴 물에 빨아 넣고

sentences.original_text: The priest is to write these curses on a scroll
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 이 저주들을 두루마리에 써야 한다

sentences.original_text: and then wash them off into the bitter water
